Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MiniportIfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LowerIfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FragmentSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Fragment" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="FragmentSize"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MiniportIfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LowerIfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MetadataSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Metadata" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="MetadataSize"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MiniportIfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LowerIfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SourcePortId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SourcePortName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="SourceNicName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="SourceNicType" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DestinationCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <struct name="Destination" count="DestinationCount"> <data name="DestinationPortId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DestinationPortName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DestinationNicName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DestinationNicType" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </struct> <data name="FragmentSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Fragment" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="FragmentSize"/> <data name="OOBDataSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OOBData" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="OOBDataSize"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FriendlyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UniqueName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ServiceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Version" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FriendlyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UniqueName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ServiceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Version" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Attached to miniport interface %1 above layer interface %2 with media type %3 (context=%4)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MiniportIfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LowerIfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MediaType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ReferenceContext" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Detached from miniport interface %1 above layer interface %2 with media type %3 (context=%4)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MiniportIfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LowerIfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MediaType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ReferenceContext" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Capture Rule: Id=%1 Directive=%2 ValueLength=%3 Value=%4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RuleId" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="Directive" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="Length" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="Length"/> </template>

Event.Message: Driver load failed with status=%1 at location %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="Location" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Context" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: FilterAttach failed with status=%1 at location %2 (context=%3)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="Location" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Context" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Received Invalid Capture Rule: Id=%1 Directive=%2 ValueLength=%3 Value=%4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RuleId" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="Directive" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="Length" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="Length"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PreviousState" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="NextState" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="Location" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Context" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PreviousState" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="NextState" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="Location" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Context" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SourceId" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="RundownId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Param1" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Param2" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ParamStr" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Description" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SourceId" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="SourceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LayerCount" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <struct name="LayerInfo" count="LayerCount"> <data name="LayerId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LayerName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </struct> </template>
